messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a flower county with 16 flower fields. The rose field is connected to the sunflower field, tulip field, daisy field, and lily field. The sunflower field is connected to the rose field, tulip field, daisy field, and aster fields. The tulip field is connected to the rose field, sunflower field, daisy field and orchid field. The daisy field is also connected to the rose field, sunflower field, tulip field, and zinnia field. The orchid field is connected to the hydrangea field, lily field, daffodil field, and tulip field. The hydrangea field is connected to the orchid field, lily field, peony field, and marigold field. The lily field is connected to rose field, peony field, hydrangea field, and orchid field. The peony field is also connected to the orchid field, hydrangea field, lily field, and chrysanthemum field. The daffodil field is connected to the chrysanthemum field, carnation field, marigold field, and lavender field. The chrysanthemum field is connected to the daffodil field, carnation field, peony field, and marigold field. The carnation field is connected to the poppy field, daffodil field, marigold field, and chrysanthemum field. The marigold field is also connected to the daffodil field, chrysanthemum field, carnation field, and hydrangea field. The poppy field is connected to the zinnia field, lavender field, aster field, and carnation field. The zinnia field is connected to the daisy field, poppy field, lavender field, and aster field. The lavender field is connected to poppy field, zinnia field, aster field, and daffodil field. The aster field is also connected to the poppy field, zinnia field, lavender field, and sunflower field. From the rose field what is the shortest path to the sunflower field? Starting from rose, please list the flower names in order, including rose, separated by commas.

I have started the code by creating an array with the name of the fields, and the final answer of the problem should be something like this:

Hi, I am working on a course project and am unable to get the logic to work for this problem. I have tried two different ways to create a method that takes in a number, and if the number is divisible by 5 it will print "yes" and if it isn't it will print "no". The first method I tried is to create a boolean that is true if the number is divisible by 5, and if the boolean is true then I want to print "yes". However, I can't figure out how to do this, as I keep getting a "no" printed instead of "yes". The second method I tried was to create a boolean that is true if the number is divisible by 5, and if the boolean is true then I want to print "yes". However, I can't figure out how to do this, as I keep getting a "no" printed instead of "yes". I have attached a picture of my code and the error message that I get when I run it. I am a beginner in Java, and would appreciate any help that I can get. Thanks in advance!
